meta.title: Echoes of the Force
meta.notes: Star Wars–inspired adventure set post-Clone Wars. Player is a Force-adept with amnesia. Includes Force alignment tracking and familiar cameos via holocrons and references. Abilities 0–30 (sum 120), skill thresholds 10/20/25, multiple endings.

rules.check: total = d20 + floor(ability/5); success if total >= dc
rules.win_condition: Reach a positive ending with all abilities > 0

scenes.title: Cold Start
scenes.description: You wake in a cracked stasis pod aboard the derelict freighter Ardent Whisper. R9-D7 chirps in panic.
scenes.background: Cold starlight spills through cracked durasteel. Distant alarms loop like a memory that won’t shut off. Panels flicker; cables sway like roots searching for ground.

choices.option: Calm the droid and assess damage

success.narration: R9 settles; you hear hull creaks and a failing power loop.

failure.narration: You miss a beat; alarms grow louder.

choices.option: Force the pod open and move

success.narration: You rip a panel free; cold air floods your lungs.

failure.narration: Metal bites your palms; you push through.

scenes.title: Ruptured Corridor
scenes.description: A hull breach yawns ahead. Magnetic boots struggle. A salvage skiff docks clumsily nearby.
scenes.background: Cold starlight spills through cracked durasteel. Distant alarms loop like a memory that won’t shut off. Panels flicker; cables sway like roots searching for ground.

choices.option: Leap the gap with a timed sprint

success.narration: You catch a rung; R9 rockets after you.

failure.narration: You bounce off bulkhead plating; bruised pride.

choices.option: Mag-clamp a ladder across

success.narration: A shaky but usable bridge clicks in.

failure.narration: The ladder shifts; you improvise.

scenes.title: Captain Kael
scenes.description: A weathered smuggler hauls you aboard. 'Name’s Kael. You look like trouble.'
scenes.background: Cold starlight spills through cracked durasteel. Distant alarms loop like a memory that won’t shut off. Panels flicker; cables sway like roots searching for ground. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Be honest and ask for passage

success.narration: He shrugs: 'Fine. Pay me in something other than credits.'

failure.narration: He squints: 'We’ll see.'

choices.option: Bluff that you’re Republic intel (Deception)

success.narration: He laughs: 'Republic? That museum’s closed.'

failure.narration: He narrows his eyes; trust drops a notch.

scenes.title: Engine Room Puzzle
scenes.description: Kael’s ship sputters. A cracked manifold and a misaligned motivator hum out of phase.
scenes.background: Cold starlight spills through cracked durasteel. Distant alarms loop like a memory that won’t shut off. Panels flicker; cables sway like roots searching for ground.

choices.option: Realign the motivator by feel (Attunement)

success.narration: The hum locks; lights warm to steady amber.

failure.narration: Feedback stings; you ground it with breath.

choices.option: Patch the manifold with scrap and sealant

success.narration: A serviceable fix; Kael whistles, impressed.

failure.narration: Sealant blobs and you rework it under pressure.

scenes.title: Hard Burn
scenes.description: TIE sensor pings flash across the scopes. Kael snarls and punches it.
scenes.background: Cold starlight spills through cracked durasteel. Distant alarms loop like a memory that won’t shut off. Panels flicker; cables sway like roots searching for ground. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Strap in and guide the jump vector

success.narration: You spot a micro-window between pings.

failure.narration: You nearly pick a gravity well; corrected.

choices.option: Man the turret to keep them honest

success.narration: Your bursts clip a TIE; they back off.

failure.narration: Glancing hit shakes the deck.

scenes.title: Blue Tunnel
scenes.description: Starlines smear. You feel something call from a world of dunes: Narsuun Prime.
scenes.background: Cold starlight spills through cracked durasteel. Distant alarms loop like a memory that won’t shut off. Panels flicker; cables sway like roots searching for ground. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Meditate on the echo

success.narration: A memory of a robed figure by a sunken door.

failure.narration: The vision fuzzes; intent remains.

choices.option: Chart a safe re-entry with Kael

success.narration: You calculate a steep but quiet approach.

failure.narration: You’ll skim a sensor grid; risky.

scenes.title: Dust World
scenes.description: Narsuun Prime swells in the viewport—one great scar of canyon cut by wind and time.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Skim low to avoid patrols

success.narration: Sand sprays; sensors stay quiet.

failure.narration: A sputter draws a distant ping.

choices.option: Pose as a scrap hauler

success.narration: Kael’s transponder sells it.

failure.narration: An Imperial query queues; time shortens.

scenes.title: Neon Bazaar
scenes.description: Under tarps and neon, Jawas haggle with Trandoshans. R9-D7 whistles at a Holocron shell on a blanket.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air.

choices.option: Bargain fairly for the shell (Persuasion)

success.narration: Trader warms to you; slips a clue: old clone trooper nearby.

failure.narration: They roll their eyes; price spikes.

choices.option: Swipe the shell when the trader blinks (Sleight of Hand)

success.narration: R9 provides a perfect beep distraction.

failure.narration: A shout; you melt into the crowd.

scenes.title: Old Soldier
scenes.description: In a shuttered cantina, a scarred clone—CT-89 ‘Marlow’—cleans a DC-15. 'I fought for ideals. What do you fight for?'
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air.

choices.option: Say: to protect people who can’t fight back

success.narration: He nods slow. 'Then you’ll need this map.'

failure.narration: He sighs; gives you a partial map anyway.

choices.option: Say: to stop the Empire, whatever it takes

success.narration: A hard glint in his eye mirrors yours.

failure.narration: He frowns but doesn’t argue.

scenes.title: Canyon Run
scenes.description: You ride a rented skiff into the great scar. Stormtrooper dust prints cross ahead.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain.

choices.option: Outrace the patrols along the ridge

success.narration: The skiff hums; your friend whoops in the wind.

failure.narration: A skid gouges the hull.

choices.option: Hide in the lee of rocks and wait

success.narration: The patrol passes; your patience pays.

failure.narration: A trooper lingers; tension pricks.

scenes.title: Wall of Sand
scenes.description: A storm boils up, swallowing the canyon mouth.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain.

choices.option: Pilot by instruments while blind

success.narration: Your improvised filters do the job.

failure.narration: A microcrash rattles teeth.

choices.option: Trust the Force to feel the eddies

success.narration: You curve through quiet pockets of wind.

failure.narration: A buffeting gust tests your balance.

scenes.title: Sunken Door
scenes.description: Half-buried in sand: an ancient door with a Jedi sigil. R9 projects the Holocron shell; it hums faintly.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Decode the entry pattern (Arcana)

success.narration: The sigils align into a quiet chord.

failure.narration: A glyph sputters; you brute-force the last step.

choices.option: Force the door with raw power

success.narration: Stone grinds; dust avalanches.

failure.narration: Your shoulders burn; the door yields anyway.

scenes.title: Temple Antechamber
scenes.description: Blue hololamps flicker alive. Dust turns to stars in the beams.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Move with reverence and minimal touch

success.narration: The air warms; you feel welcome.

failure.narration: A lamp flares, then calms.

choices.option: Hurry toward the strongest signal

success.narration: You thread fallen pillars fast.

failure.narration: You clip a pedestal; R9 warbles in alarm.

scenes.title: Hall of Echoes
scenes.description: Holopanels bloom with recordings—younglings sparring, a cloaked Master teaching in riddles.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Study the forms and copy a kata

success.narration: Your body remembers; mind follows.

failure.narration: An old routine, newly clumsy.

choices.option: Bow to the Masters and ask for guidance

success.narration: The panels brighten like smiles.

failure.narration: For a moment, silence; then a door hums open.

scenes.title: Holocron of Master Yoda
scenes.description: A small green figure flickers. 'Clear, your path is not. But kind, you may choose to be.'
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Affirm: I will protect life first

success.narration: The holocron glows warmer. 'Good, that is.'

failure.narration: Your voice wavers; the holocron hums anyway.

choices.option: Affirm: I will end threats decisively

success.narration: 'Hmm.' The glow cools.

failure.narration: Resolve hardens; the room chills.

scenes.title: Imperial Interruption
scenes.description: Kael crackles over comms: 'Inquisitor landing at your coordinates. Make it quick!'
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Rig the entry to slow pursuers (Engineering)

success.narration: Collapsible braces prime with a soft chirp.

failure.narration: A brace jams half-right; good enough.

choices.option: Urge Kael to lift off and draw fire

success.narration: He curses but trusts you. 'Owe me for paint!'

failure.narration: He stalls a moment too long; shields spark.

scenes.title: Hidden Stair
scenes.description: A narrow stair winds down into colder dark. The Force grows loud.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Breathe and follow the current

success.narration: The right turns find you.

failure.narration: A loop tests your patience, then yields.

choices.option: Hurry while the trap still resets

success.narration: You beat a grate’s cycle by a heartbeat.

failure.narration: A scrape; you’re fine.

scenes.title: Mirror Trial
scenes.description: Polished stone shows not your face but a masked figure with your stance.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Lower your saber; offer peace

success.narration: The mask tilts, then fades.

failure.narration: The mask laughs; you pass through cold.

choices.option: Challenge the shadow to improve together

success.narration: Your strikes echo and resolve into a shared rhythm.

failure.narration: Arms burn; lesson lands late.

scenes.title: Weights of Choice
scenes.description: Two doors: one labeled Mercy, one labeled Victory.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Open Mercy

success.narration: The door is light to your touch.

failure.narration: It sticks; you persist kindly.

choices.option: Open Victory

success.narration: The door groans and yields.

failure.narration: It opens; air turns cold.

scenes.title: Vault of Memory
scenes.description: A hololog plays: your Master arguing with an Inquisitor. 'Power is clarity,' the Inquisitor insists.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Reject the Inquisitor’s creed aloud

success.narration: Your voice steadies your heart.

failure.narration: Silence answers; you still know your truth.

choices.option: Admit the allure and vow control

success.narration: You cage your hunger with a choice.

failure.narration: A tremor rides your breath.

scenes.title: Kael’s Distress
scenes.description: Comms crackle: 'I can’t shake them forever!' R9 squeals; a TIE locks tone.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Sprint to the surface to help

success.narration: You run the stair like a spiral of light.

failure.narration: You miss a step; ankle protests.

choices.option: Re-route temple power to scramble sensors

success.narration: Panels pulse; targeting reticles blink out.

failure.narration: A fuse pops; half-effective.

scenes.title: Surface Scramble
scenes.description: The sandstorm thins. Kael dives; a shuttle with black wings descends—the Inquisitor.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Wave Kael off—keep civilians safe (Light)

success.narration: He peels away; you draw the danger to yourself.

failure.narration: He hesitates; you shout and he trusts.

choices.option: Bait the Inquisitor into the canyon (Grey)

success.narration: You choose ground; advantage is yours.

failure.narration: A dust devil spoils part of the plan.

scenes.title: Duel in the Dust
scenes.description: A red blade hisses alive. 'Your master failed you,' the Inquisitor says.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain.

choices.option: Hold defense, protect, and wait for openings

success.narration: You are a wall that moves when needed.

failure.narration: You tire; defense still holds.

choices.option: Strike hard to end this quickly

success.narration: A furious exchange drives them back.

failure.narration: You overextend; regain footing.

scenes.title: Echoes Settling
scenes.description: The Inquisitor falls or flees; either way, the dunes stop ringing.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain.

choices.option: Spare the fallen and secure their saber

success.narration: Mercy seeds futures you may never see.

failure.narration: You settle for restraint alone.

choices.option: Finish them to end the threat

success.narration: Silence now; consequences later.

failure.narration: The deed hardens something inside.

scenes.title: Under Twin Moons
scenes.description: The temple heart calls one last time. R9 whistles a hopeful chord.
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Walk with Kael and R9—no one left behind

success.narration: Your steps find a shared rhythm.

failure.narration: You wait for Kael to catch up; patience.

choices.option: Go alone to spare them danger

success.narration: You carry your fear kindly.

failure.narration: Loneliness scratches but clarifies.

scenes.title: Heart of the Enclave
scenes.description: A circular dais rises. A holoprojector uplinks to a fractured network. A recording of Kenobi’s warning flickers: 'Avoid the Temple. Trust in the Force.'
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Sync the holonet to broadcast a beacon (Light)

success.narration: Scattered allies will hear and gather.

failure.narration: Partial link; enough hope leaks through.

choices.option: Lock the enclave and keep its power secret (Grey)

success.narration: Knowledge guarded is knowledge preserved.

failure.narration: You preserve a cracked core.

choices.option: Bind the network to your command (Dark)

success.narration: A thousand faint circuits answer one will—yours.

failure.narration: It resists; you force compliance.

scenes.title: The Force Decides
scenes.description: The Holocron shell glows. Yoda’s image returns: 'Choose, you always do.' Kael watches, jaw tight; R9 beeps a question.
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Speak hope and mercy

success.narration: Your words become a path others can walk.

failure.narration: The words stumble; intent remains.

choices.option: Speak balance and responsibility

success.narration: Precision becomes compassion with edges.

failure.narration: Your logic softens into kindness anyway.

choices.option: Speak dominion and certainty

success.narration: The chamber bows to your command.

failure.narration: Not all spirits bend; some simply wait.

scenes.title: Ending: Mercy and Renewal
scenes.description: A quiet rebellion grows from your signal. Marlow trains villagers to defend themselves; Kael laughs easier; R9 learns a happy trill.
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Breathe and begin again

success.narration: The Light is a practice.

scenes.title: Ending: Echo of Both Sides
scenes.description: You keep the enclave’s secrets safe, sharing only what the galaxy can bear. Shadows shorten at noon, lengthen at dusk.
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Walk between with care

success.narration: The middle path still has milestones.

scenes.title: Ending: Dominion and Silence
scenes.description: The network obeys. Patrol routes change at your whim. The galaxy holds its breath.
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Rule the echoes you awakened

success.narration: Power answers power, for now.

scenes.title: Ending: Fallen to Silence
scenes.description: Strength without wisdom led you into a quiet that devours. Somewhere, a droid waits for you to wake again.
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Panels flicker; cables sway like roots searching for ground. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain.

choices.option: Fade to the hum of hyperdrive

success.narration: A lesson, held for next time.

scenes.title: Junkfield Detour
scenes.description: A field of wrecked walkers offers parts and pitfalls. Jawas watch with glittering eyes.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain.

choices.option: Scavenge respectfully and barter

success.narration: You make friends and find a power cell.

failure.narration: You haggle poorly; no harm done.

choices.option: Rush and grab the shiniest bits

success.narration: You snag a stabilizer before it collapses.

failure.narration: A crash draws attention.

scenes.title: Refuge of Echoes
scenes.description: An alcove shelters inscriptions of padawans long gone. R9 beeps softly.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Rest and center

success.narration: Breath steadies; purpose returns.

failure.narration: Restless but better than nothing.

choices.option: Study the carvings for tactics (Investigation)

success.narration: You note a clever ambush pattern.

failure.narration: Dust hides the best bits; you try anyway.

scenes.title: Bazaar Backdoor
scenes.description: Curtains of bead-strings hide a service alley out of the neon tangle.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air.

choices.option: Slip through to the junkfield

success.narration: You thread traders and crates.

failure.narration: A crate bumps your hip; keep moving.

scenes.title: Marlow’s Cache
scenes.description: CT-89 gestures to a crate: rations, a cloak, and a power coupler stamped with Republic sigils.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air.

choices.option: Accept with gratitude

success.narration: He grins. 'Don’t die stupid.'

failure.narration: You nod awkwardly; still helpful.

choices.option: Insist others need it more

success.narration: He respects your resolve.

failure.narration: He pockets the coupler for later.

scenes.title: R9’s Question
scenes.description: R9 projects little hearts and a map. Kael smirks. 'The droid thinks we should help the miners next.'
scenes.background: Twin moons hang unblinking. Every heartbeat echoes like a saber ignition. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air. Fuel lines hiss softly; droids trade beeps like gossip.

choices.option: Promise to help after this (Light)

success.narration: R9 records a cheerful chirp.

failure.narration: R9 believes you anyway.

choices.option: Say: we fix our ship first (Grey)

success.narration: Practical. Kael approves.

failure.narration: You’ll need parts either way.

scenes.title: Smuggler’s Bypass
scenes.description: Kael reveals a cramped tunnel used by runners to avoid checkpoints.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Sand ticks against armor plates like rain.

choices.option: Crawl through quietly (Stealth)

success.narration: Sand muffles your passage.

failure.narration: A sneeze echoes; no one hears.

choices.option: Distract with a decoy charge

success.narration: A pop-bang draws patrols away.

failure.narration: It fizzles but still helps.

scenes.title: Crossroads Vision
scenes.description: You see two versions of your future: a teacher with laughing younglings, and a lone blade in shadow.
scenes.background: Ancient stone tastes of iron and dust. The Force murmurs from behind walls and within your ribs. Blue holo-lights paint dust motes into constellations.

choices.option: Reach toward the teacher

success.narration: Warmth pools behind your sternum.

failure.narration: Even doubt teaches.

choices.option: Reach toward the blade

success.narration: Focus sharpens like frost.

failure.narration: Resolve tightens; air cools.

scenes.title: Trader’s Wink
scenes.description: A scarfed vendor nods toward a bead curtain and vanishes into the crowd.
scenes.background: Heat ghosts rise from dunes. Scrappers barter in whispers; stormtrooper patrols click like metronomes. Spice steam, ozone, and fried nuna mingle in the air.

choices.option: Follow to the back alley

success.narration: You trust the hint.

failure.narration: You shrug and go anyway.
